title: 陳雲：唔好要求政府做任何野

replies.msg:
陳雲：Don't trust anything the SAR government said. Don't request the government to do anything. Don't make a dialogue relation with the government when the government pretends to do something for you.
Hong Kong will die if you do. But I am sure most of you will do. Because you are arrogant and lonely and stupid at the same time, aren't you? These three elements of your personality urge you to do the three things altogether. Triple dead sure.
Welcome to the Wan Chin haters list.

。。。想重啟十點尻叫 麻煩入嚟睇睇。。。
https://lih.kg/1700177
- 分享自 LIHKG 討論區
